title: Govind Hotel Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Indian, International, Take-out
description: A vegetarian Indian roof top restaurant, with a view of the Fort, offers a broad range of cuisines including Indian, Rajasthani, Chinese and Western dishes, such as burgers, pasta and pizza. Plenty of vegan options available. Indian and continental breakfasts, waffles. Coffee based on beans. Is part of the hotel, but serves to non-guests also. Free Wi-Fi. English speaking staff. Central location 200 meters from main station.
